TEXT.French: [COLOR_YIELD_COMMERCE]%s1 a %d2 pièces d'or disponible pour le commerce.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YIELD_COMMERCE]%s1 ha %d2 oro disponibile per il commercio.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YIELD_COMMERCE]%s1 tiene %d2 de oro disponible para el comercio.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YIELD_COMMERCE]%s1 has %d2 gold per turn available for trade.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YIELD_COMMERCE]%s1 a %d2 pièces d'or par tour disponible pour le commerce.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YIELD_COMMERCE]%s1 hat %d2 Gold pro Runde zum Handeln.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YIELD_COMMERCE]%s1 ha %d2 oro per turno disponibile per il commercio.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YIELD_COMMERCE]%s1 tiene %d2 de oro por turno disponible para el comercio.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 will grow to size %d2 on the next turn.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 atteindra la taille de %d2 au prochain tour.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]Die Bevölkerung von %s1 wächst nächste Runde auf %d2 an.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 crescerà a grandezza %d2 al prossimo turno.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 will shrink to size %d2 on the next turn.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 verra sa population réduite à %d2 au prochain tour.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Die Bevölkerung von %s1 schrumpft nächste Runde auf %d2.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 si ridurrà a grandezza %d2 al prossimo turno.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 se reducirá tamaño %d2 el próximo turno.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 will become unhealthy on the next turn.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Die Bevölkerung von %s1 wird nächste Runde krank.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 se volverá insalubre el próximo turno.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]%s1 will become healthy on the next turn.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Les conditions sanitaires de %s1 deviendront bonnes au prochain tour.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Die Bevölkerung von %s1 wird nächste Runde gesund.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]%s1 se volverá sano el próximo turno.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 will become unhappy on the next turn.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]La population de %s1 deviendra mécontente au prochain tour.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Die Bevölkerung von %s1 wird nächste Runde unzufrieden.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 se volverá infeliz el próximo turno.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]%s1 will become happy on the next turn.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]La population de %s1 deviendra satisfaite au prochain tour.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Die Bevölkerung von %s1 wird nächste Runde zufrieden.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]%s1 se volverá feliz el próximo turno.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.French: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Les conditions sanitaires de %s1 sont à nouveau bonnes.[COLOR_REVERT]
[COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]La population de %s1 a augmenté pour atteindre la taille de %d2.[COLOR_REVERT]
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 a vu sa population réduite à %d2.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 can hurry %s2 for %d3[ICON_ANGRYPOP] with %d4[ICON_PRODUCTION] overflow and +1[ICON_UNHAPPY] for %d5 turns.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 peut accélerer la construction de %s2 avec comme conséquences %d3[ICON_ANGRYPOP], %d4[ICON_PRODUCTION] en surplus et +1[ICON_UNHAPPY] pendant %d5 tours.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 kann das Bauprojekt "%s2" unter Einsatz von %d3[ICON_ANGRYPOP] beschleunigen (Überschuss: %d4[ICON_PRODUCTION]), wobei für %d5 Runden +1[ICON_UNHAPPY] in der Stadt verursacht wird.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 può accelerare %s2 per %d3[ICON_ANGRYPOP] con un surplus di %d4[ICON_PRODUCTION] e 1[ICON_UNHAPPY] per %d5 turni.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 puede acelerar %s2 para %d3[ICON_ANGRYPOP] con %d4[ICON_PRODUCTION] de desbordamiento y +1[ICON_UNHAPPY] para %d5 turnos.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 can hurry %s2 for %d3[ICON_ANGRYPOP] with %d4[ICON_PRODUCTION] overflow, %d6[ICON_GOLD] added to the treasury, and +1[ICON_UNHAPPY] for %d5 turns.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 peut accélerer la construction de %s2 avec comme conséquences %d3[ICON_ANGRYPOP], %d4[ICON_PRODUCTION] en surplus, %d6[ICON_GOLD] ajouté au trésor, et +1[ICON_UNHAPPY] pendant %d5 tours.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 kann das Bauprojekt "%s2" unter Einsatz von %d3[ICON_ANGRYPOP] beschleunigen (Überschuss: %d4[ICON_PRODUCTION] + %d6[ICON_GOLD] für die Staatskasse), wobei für %d5 Runden +1[ICON_UNHAPPY] in der Stadt verursacht wird.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 può accelerare %s2 per %d3[ICON_ANGRYPOP] con un surplus di %d4[ICON_PRODUCTION], un aumento del tesoro di %d6[ICON_GOLD] e +1[ICON_UNHAPPY] per %d5 turni.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 can hurry %s2 for %d3[ICON_ANGRYPOP] with %d4[ICON_PRODUCTION] overflow, %d6[ICON_GOLD] added to the treasury, and +1[ICON_UNHAPPY] for %d5 turns.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.French: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 peut accélerer la production de %s2 pour un coût de %d3[ICON_GOLD].[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 kann das Bauprojekt "%s2" unter Einsatz von %d3[ICON_GOLD] beschleunigen.[COLOR_REVERT]
